title: 32 Stories: The Complete Optic Nerve Mini-Comics
description: The comics that first launched Tomine into his luminary career, in a special-edition box setRedesigned to coincide with the release of Shortcomings in paperback is a brand-new edition of Adrian Tomine's first book, 32 Stories , that collects his inaugural mini-comics in a special edition. This onetime printing includes facsimile reprints of the seven mini-comics packaged in a slipcase, as well as an additional pamphlet containing a new introduction and notes by Tomine.
author: Adrian Tomine
